properties.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning until 3:30 PM EST for northeastern Houston and southwestern Early Counties
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a

* Severe Thunderstorm Warning for...
  Northeastern Houston County in southeastern Alabama...
  Southwestern Early County in southwestern Georgia...

* Until 330 PM EST/230 PM CST/.

* At 245 PM EST/145 PM CST/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cottonwood, moving east at 30 mph.

  HAZARD...Quarter size hail.

  SOURCE...Radar indicated.

  IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected.

* Locations impacted include...
  Dothan, Ashford, Cowarts, Centerville, Avon, Gordon, Jakin, Memphis, Saffold, Pansey, Howards Mill, Enon, Lovetown, Wilson Mill, Cuba, Killarney, Farley Nuclear Plant, Ardilla, Cedar Springs, and Hentown.
properties.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
properties.areaDesc: Northeastern Houston County AL; Southwestern Early County GA
